title: Woman dies after being left behind by cruise ship on Australian island
description: Crew of Coral Adventurer only realised the 80-year-old Australian was missing hours after they left Lizard Island on the Great Barrier Reef.
content:
An 80-year-old Australian woman has been found dead on a Great Barrier Reef island after being left behind by the cruise ship she was travelling on.
The woman had been hiking on Lizard Island, 250km (155 miles) north of Cairns, with fellow passengers... [2144 chars]

title: Reeves vows to 'defy' gloomy economic forecasts
description: The chancellor says investment is the answer to boosting the UK's productivity performance.
content:
The chancellor has vowed to "defy" gloomy forecasts for the UK economy after it emerged the government is facing a bigger-than-expected hole in the public finances.
The BBC understands the official forecaster, the Office for Budget Responsibility (OB... [2592 chars]

title: BBC investigation exposes dangerous teeth-whitening industry
description: A BBC investigation finds kits on sale with more than 500 times the legal limit of bleaches in them.
content:
Illegal teeth-whitening treatments that can burn gums and destroy teeth are being sold in car parks and on social media, a BBC investigation has found.
Some gels contain more than 500 times the legal limit of bleaching agent for over-the-counter prod... [5766 chars]

title: Five more prisoners freed in error after sex offender’s release from Essex jail
description: Union says staff shortages and confusion over early release schemes are driving a rise in mistakes
content:
Five other prisoners have also been released by mistake in the same week a convicted Ethiopian sex offender was allowed to walk free from an Essex jail, says the prison officers’ union.
The disclosure of further mistakes highlights the intense pressu... [2339 chars]

title: NHS makes morning-after pill available for free across pharmacies in England
description: Those in need of free emergency contraception no longer have to see their GP or attend a sexual health clinic
content:
The NHS has made the morning-after pill available for free across pharmacies in England in an effort to reduce a “postcode lottery” of access to emergency contraception.
Almost 10,000 pharmacies are now able to offer the pill without charge, saving t... [2181 chars]
